name: Brew Buddy
description: Brew Buddy enables users to search for breweries in any location, presenting them on a map alongside relevant information. Users can easily favorite breweries, and their selections are stored locally for future reference.

name: BookClub
description: Book Club offers users the ability to discover and buy books, find or create book clubs, and manage notes for each book within the app.

name: JSJ Storefront
description: WildScribe lets users organize and manage their adventures through activity journals, offering features like adding, editing, deleting, and searching for activity logs within each journal.

name: Libation Station
description: Libation Station enables users to search for and save favorite cocktail recipes using local storage.
